articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets U.S. Assistant Secretary of State
U.S. Assistant Secretary of State Leaves
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets U.S. Assistant Secretary of State 
   Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Christopher Hill, U.S. assistant secretary of State, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
